sourcesContent:
import { Container, Grid, Table, TableHead, TableCell, TableBody, TableRow, Typography, InputLabel, TextField, Button, Stack, } from "@mui/material"; import axios from "axios"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; export default function WPNumberDetails() { const [workPermitDetails, setWorkPermitDetails] = useState(null); const styles = { firstTableTypo: { fontSize: "12px", whiteSpace: "nowrap" } }; const { id } = useParams(); const [active, setActive] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const getWorkPermitDetails = async () => { try { const { data } = await axios.get( `http://localhost:9090/get-work-permit?workPermitID=${id}` ); setWorkPermitDetails(data); } catch (error) { console.log(error); } }; getWorkPermitDetails(); }, []); const activeDetails = (data) => { const today = new Date().toLocaleDateString(); const active = data.kyDetails.filter((details) => { const active = new Date(details.filledDate).toLocaleDateString(); if (today === active) return true; return false; }); setActive(active); }; useEffect(() => { if (workPermitDetails.kyDetails) { activeDetails(workPermitDetails); } }, [workPermitDetails]); return ( <> Work Permit Number {workPermitDetails?.workPermitPlanId || "n/a"} Type of Work {workPermitDetails?.workPermitType || "n/a"} From Date {new Date( workPermitDetails?.wpIssueFromDate ).toLocaleString() || "n/a"} To Date {new Date( workPermitDetails?.wpIssueToDate ).toLocaleString() || "n/a"} No of Persons {workPermitDetails?.wpNoPerson || "n/a"} {/* Group Test Issue Date Aug 01, 2023 2:000 pm */} {/* 12345 Work Requiring Permit Aug01,2023 2:00 PM Test Test Test Aug01,2023 2:00 PM */}
Activity Details Active KY Sheets KY Sheet No KY Fill Date Area / Sub Area Requiring Department {/* Issuing Department */} 12345 07/27/23 Bullind 5 First Floor seating Area CVL-R 12345 07/27/23 Bullind 5 First Floor seating Area CVL-R
Completed/ Archived KY Sheets KY Sheet No KY Fill Date Area / Sub Area Requiring Department {/* Issuing Department */} 12345 07/27/23 Bullind 5 First Floor seating Area CVL-R {/* */} 12345 07/27/23 Bullind 5 First Floor seating Area CVL-R {/* */}
); }
